# This license key has been revoked
如果弹出如下错误：
![bc_err](beyondcompare/bc_err.png)
则
> rm -rf ~/.config/bcompare/*
<!--more-->
# 破解
> sudo sed -i "s/keexjEP3t4Mue23hrnuPtY4TdcsqNiJL--Tsk7YBTz0WpSpoYyPgx6Iki5KLtQ5G-aKP9eysnkuOAkrvHU8bLbGtZteGwJarev03PhfCioJL4OSqsmQGEvDbHFEbNl1qJtdwEriR+VNZts9vNNLk7UGfeNwIiqpxjk4Mn09nmSd8FhM4ifvcaIbNCRoMPGl6KU12iseSe+w+1kFsLhX+OhQM8WXcWV10cGqBzQE9OqOLUcg9n0krrR3KrohstS9smTwEx9olyLYppvC0p5i7dAx2deWvM1ZxKNs0BvcXGukR+/g" /usr/lib/beyondcompare/BCompare

# 输入秘钥
重启bc，输入秘钥
> --- BEGIN LICENSE KEY ---
ayvZeJDYPBHS4J-1K6g6bDBuPoo0G-oGAq35blZtAoRqC-qQeSz28XAzX

--- END LICENSE KEY -----
